title: 06/02/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 06/02/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's action in the NBA. Reggie Miller, explains why he thinks the Lakers mailed it in last night. Chris Bosh tells the story of what it was like to be on the floor when Kobe Bryant dropped 81 against his Raptors. And Chris Mannix expresses his frustration with the Celtics Ownership for not considering Sam Presti to replace Danny Ainge

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's action in the NBA. Reggie Miller, explains why he thinks the Lakers mailed it in last night. Chris Bosh tells the story of what it was like to be on the floor when Kobe Bryant dropped 81 against his Raptors. And Chris Mannix expresses his frustration with the Celtics Ownership for not considering Sam Presti to replace Danny Ainge
